DOC.brief_title: CompuFlo速 Assessment Study Epidural Space Verification
DOC.criteria: 1 . The Subject least 18 year age screening , 91st birthday . 2 . The Subject require epidural procedure implement part standard medical treatment accord Principal Investigator assessment . 3 . The Subject willing undergo Informed Consent process prior enrollment study . 4 . The Subject willing participate study least 30 day epidural procedure implementation . 5 . The Subject willing participate study least 3 day procedure . 1 . Contraindications epidural procedure / anesthesia ( circumstance risk associated epidural procedure higher usual . These circumstance include , limited anatomical abnormality , spina bifida scoliosis , infection near site insertion , allergy anesthetic intend drug , uncorrected hypovolemia , increase intracranial pressure etc. ) . 2 . Patients present emergency csection emergency . 3 . Exclusive use treatment intravenous analgesia opioids . 4 . Prior back surgery lumbar area would prevent epidural access . 5 . Preexisting neurological deficit would interfere dermatome identification . 6 . The Subject observe seizure within 7 day prior study enrollment . 7 . Presumed and/or confirm septic embolus . 8 . The Subject skin condition ( i.e. , hemangioma , scleroderma , psoriasis , rash , open wound tattoo ) lumbar region great 4 cm2 . 9 . The Subject previously participate another investigational drug device trial within precede 4 week . 10 . Severe coexist terminal systemic disease limit life expectancy may interfere study procedure . 11 . The Subject otherwise determine Investigator medically unsuitable participation study .
